name: Heck-O-Sphere
description:
Heck-O-Sphere is a game made for the 2017 Music Jam. The goal is to protect the center sphere by blocking bullets with the shields.

Controls: A to move counter-clockwise, D to move clockwise

Credits:

Shader Artist and Programmer: Connor Haynes

Programmer: Dylan Armstrong

Design: Christian Meffert, Alexander Sutton, Keon Dohn

Artist: Gabby Dumire

Music: Michael Dumire

Soundtrack is Available here:

https://soundcloud.com/mikethete/sets/heck-o-sphere-soundtrack
